Trade/Device Name(s): Dexcom G6 Glucose Program Continuous Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dexcom G6 Glucose Program Continuous Glucose Monitoring System for real-time management of diabetes via continuous glucose monitoring
Indications for Use Summary: Real-time, continuous glucose monitoring system indicated for diabetes management in persons age 2 years and older, intended to replace fingerstick blood glucose testing for diabetes treatment decisions and aid in detection of hypo- and hyperglycemia, can be used alone or with digitally connected devices
